name: VHS upscale and denoise Film
author: itewreed
description:
Category: VHS Tapes
Purpose: VHS

VHS captures of Film material, but may work on VHS recorded native SD-TV material as well. Also useable for cleaned up source material
dataset: For LR, two decade old VHS recording of a movie from TV, captured with enabled TBC on the VCR. For HR, Blu-ray rip of that movie.
